title: Stories of the Border Marches
author: Lang, John
snippet: Fifty acres of poor soil lying betweenDoorpool and Chesters he certainly gave them in its stead, and must havehad pleasure in his bargain, for he had gained a rich glebe and had forever freed himself from his clerical neighbours.
